articles.title: FBI Dispatching Agents to D.C. Streets as Trump Weighs Calling National Guard
articles.description: The FBI has begun deploying agents to Washington, D.C., to address violent crimes, as President Trump considers activating the National Guard, despite data indicating a decline in crime rates.

articles.title: Trump to Meet with Putin in Alaska to Discuss Ukraine's Future Borders
articles.description: President Trump is scheduled to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska to discuss potential resolutions to Russia's war on Ukraine, including proposals for Ukraine to cede territory to Russia.

articles.title: Israel Targets and Kills Several Journalists in Gaza Amid Growing International Recognition of Palestinian State
articles.description: Israeli airstrikes in Gaza have resulted in the deaths of several journalists, coinciding with more countries planning to recognize a Palestinian state.
